official_title: To provide that law enforcement officers and other Federal employees in the Santa Barbara, CA Primary Metropolitan Statistical Area be treated, for purposes of certain pay provisions of the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990, in the same manner as if they were serving in the Los Angeles-Anaheim-Riverside, CA Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area.

summary.text: Provides the same treatment under the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990 with respect to interim geographic pay provisions and special pay provisions for Federal employees and Federal law enforcement officers respectively, serving in the Santa Barbara, California (CA) Primary Metropolitan Statistical Area as if such employees and officers were serving in the Los Angeles-Anaheim-Riverside, CA Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area.
